instructions:
The recipe above makes 8 servings. Using the first four ingredients, prepare meatballs *(makes 16)* and
sauce as directed on package and set aside. For 4 servings, keep 8 meatballs and half the sauce warm and
freeze the other half of sauce and meatballs for a future meal.
For 4 servings prepare 1 package of noodles and only half of the next 3 ingredients. When noodles are
tender, add 1/2 cup of sour cream and the 8 meatballs and sauce. Reheat and serve.
ingredients: 1 pkg McCormick's Swedish Meatballs seasoning and sauce
name: Beef Stroganoff
creator: Jim Decker
